title: How to Make Easy Rocky Road Fudge

steps.headline: Line a 9 by 13 inch (22.9 by 33 cm) or 8 by 8 inch (20.3 by 20.3 cm) square pan with foil or parchment paper.
steps.description: The larger the pan, the thinner the fudge squares will be when you are done.

steps.headline: Spray the foil or paper with cooking spray.
Coarsely chop 1 1/2 cups (173.9 g) of walnuts, or another nut of your choice.
Pour a 12 oz.
steps.description: (340.1 g) package of semi-sweet chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl. For a richer fudge, mix bittersweet and semisweet chocolate chips together.

steps.headline: Add a 14 oz.
steps.description: (414 ml) can of sweetened condensed milk.

steps.headline: Place the bowl in the microwave for 1 minute on the high setting.
Remove the bowl from the microwave and stir.
Place the bowl in the microwave for 15 second intervals, stirring between each interval.
steps.description: Stop heating when the chocolate chips have just melted.

steps.headline: Add 1 tsp.
steps.description: (4.9 ml) of vanilla extract. Stir into the chocolate mixture.

steps.headline: Fold in 3 cups (149 g) of miniature marshmallows and the 1 1/2 cups (173.9 g) of walnuts.
Press the mixture into the sprayed pan with a spatula, until it forms your "rocky road."
Place in the refrigerator for 2 hours before serving.
Use the foil or parchment paper to lift and remove the fudge from the pan.
Cut into squares and serve.
steps.description: The fudge will last from 7 to 10 days.

text: Line a 9 by 13 inch (22.9 by 33 cm) or 8 by 8 inch (20.3 by 20.3 cm) square pan with foil or parchment paper. The larger the pan, the thinner the fudge squares will be when you are done. Spray the foil or paper with cooking spray.  Coarsely chop 1 1/2 cups (173.9 g) of walnuts, or another nut of your choice.  Pour a 12 oz. (340.1 g) package of semi-sweet chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl. For a richer fudge, mix bittersweet and semisweet chocolate chips together. Add a 14 oz. (414 ml) can of sweetened condensed milk. Place the bowl in the microwave for 1 minute on the high setting.  Remove the bowl from the microwave and stir.  Place the bowl in the microwave for 15 second intervals, stirring between each interval. Stop heating when the chocolate chips have just melted. Add 1 tsp. (4.9 ml) of vanilla extract. Stir into the chocolate mixture. Fold in 3 cups (149 g) of miniature marshmallows and the 1 1/2 cups (173.9 g) of walnuts.  Press the mixture into the sprayed pan with a spatula, until it forms your "rocky road."  Place in the refrigerator for 2 hours before serving.  Use the foil or parchment paper to lift and remove the fudge from the pan.  Cut into squares and serve. The fudge will last from 7 to 10 days. Finished.
